channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: SA Today
channel.desc: Invited guests give more depth on big provincial and regional stories that can be an issue of national importance. It also includes general news.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: Full View
channel.desc: The show also features 30 minutes of market sense in-depth.

channel.name: SABC News ZA
channel.title: The Late Edition
channel.desc: A 360 degree view of all the stories that made headlines through packages, features, and interviews.[(96057)]
